thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Rezidor Q4 operating profit falls

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rezidor Q4 operating profit falls
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Rezidor:
* Q4 ‍REVENUE DECREASED BY MEUR 1.5 (-0.6%) TO MEUR 241.6​
* Q4 ‍EBITDA DECREASED BY MEUR 6.3 (-27.3%) TO MEUR 16.8 AND EBITDA MARGIN DECREASED BY 2.5 PP TO 7.0%​
* SAYS ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS PROPOSES THAT NO DIVIDEND IS TO BE PAID FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2017, HOWEVER CURRENT DIVIDEND POLICY REMAINS
* EBIT INCREASED BY MEUR 6.1 (59.2%) TO MEUR -4.2 AND THE EBIT MARGIN IMPROVED BY 2.5 PP TO -1.7%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Stockholm Newsroom)
